steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 2), increase(2)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 1), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(4), then_go_to_step(4)),
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(9), number_in_box(4), put_result_into_box(9)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 1), number_in_box(6)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(6)),
Put(number_in_box(1), into_box(7)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(4), 1), number_in_box(2)), then_go_to_step(2), then_go_to_step(7)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 1), increase(2)),
Put(number_in_box(4), into_box(6)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 9?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在9号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Change Instruction 6: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 2
Change Instruction 6: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Multiply: ( number in box 9 ) * ( number in box 4 ), put result into box 9.
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 6 )
Put ( number in box 1 ) into box 7
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 4 greater than ( number in box 2 )
Change Instruction 9: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 2
Put ( number in box 4 ) into box 6
desc_zh: 更改指令6：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加2
更改指令6：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令6中第1个盒子的编号比5号盒子中的数字大吗
相乘：9号盒子中的数字*4号盒子中的数字，将结果放在9号盒子中。
判断：指令6中第1个盒子的编号比6号盒子中的数字大吗
将1号盒子中的数字放在7号盒子中
判断：指令4中第1个盒子的编号比2号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令9：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加2
将4号盒子中的数字放在6号盒子中
